content: X-EDS Steel nails Single nail for fastening metal elements to steel structures with powder-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features High application limits permits fastening on a wider range of steel strengths and steel thicknesses High ultimate tensile loads for broader steel-to-steel fastening applications Applications Fastening metal elements to steel structures ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 1/4 in Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 1/4 in | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.18 in | For use with (tools) | DX 76 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 46554 - Fastener EDS 19P10 - Package Size 100 pc - 3496952 - Kit EDS 19P10 + 6.8/11 M red 1k - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Fastener EDS 19P10 - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal red - 3496953 - Kit EDS 19P10 + 6.8/11 M yellow 1k - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Fastener EDS 19P10 - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal yellow - 46556 - Heavy duty fastener EDS 22 P10 - Package Size 100 pc
